## projects variable

Projects SDK client

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
projects: (client: APIClient) => {
    getAllMembers(projectId?: Id<'project'>): Promise<Member[]>;
    getCurrentMember(projectId: Id<'project'>): Promise<Member>;
    projectTokens: {
        delete(projectTokenId: Id<'ptkid'>, project?: Id<'project'>): Promise<void>;
        get(projectId?: Id<'project'>): Promise<ProjectToken[]>;
        create(flags: number, projectId?: Id<'project'>): Promise<ProjectToken & {
            project: Project;
        }>;
    };
    tokens: {
        delete(projectTokenId: Id<'ptkid'>, project?: Id<'project'>): Promise<void>;
        get(projectId?: Id<'project'>): Promise<ProjectToken[]>;
        create(flags: number, projectId?: Id<'project'>): Promise<ProjectToken & {
            project: Project;
        }>;
    };
    secrets: {
        getAll(projectId?: Id<'project'>): Promise<Secret[]>;
        create(name: string, value: string, projectId?: Id<'project'>): Promise<Secret>;
        delete(id: Id<'secret'> | Secret['name'], projectId?: Id<'project'>): Promise<void>;
    };
}
```
